channel.title: Silver Status
channel.description:
Alright, i dont know if this has been thought of or what sorry if im posting in the wrong area too.
I think that the server status should also have a silver status which is within the server status page with the regular servers just the background of the server should have a brighter or more eye catchy background and hover color. I think it should still cost but everyone can pay for one for just like 5$. I think this is a very good idea if you ask me, thats why i am submitting it. Lol.
Thanks :D

item.title: Silver Status
item.dc:creator: @Fanz Fanz
item.description:
@Fanz wrote:

R-Locus had a very similar idea and price. :\

Read full topic

item.title: Silver Status
item.dc:creator: @k0ed_u k0ed u
item.description:
@k0ed_u wrote:

I kinda agree with this idea.

Because I guess it would show that people actually care about their servers enough to advertise, obviously only for those who canâ€™t afford sponsored, so this could be the next best thing for them.

It would make their servers stand out more, which could attract new players to their server. This could give new servers a chance to gain some players while they try and save up for 1 of the top 10 sponsored positions.

This is just my honest opinion.

Read full topic
